com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.vertex

Class BaseVertexCentricQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.BaseQuery
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.vertex.BaseVertexCentricQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Query
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VertexCentricQuery

    public class BaseVertexCentricQuery
extends BaseQuery
    The base implementation for VertexCentricQuery which does not yet contain a reference to the base vertex of the query. This query is constructed by BasicVertexCentricQueryBuilder.constructQuery(com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.internal.RelationCategory) and then later extended by single or multi-vertex query which add the vertex to the query.

    This class override many methods in ElementQuery - check there for a description.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Field Detail

      • condition

        protected final Condition<TitanRelation> condition
        The condition of this query in QNF

      • queries

        protected final List<BackendQueryHolder<SliceQuery>> queries
        The individual component SliceQuery of this query. This query is considered an OR of the individual components (possibly filtered by the condition if not fitted).

      • direction

        protected final com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Direction direction
        The direction condition of this query. This is duplicated from the condition for efficiency reasons.
